attributes.action: reintroduce traditional rote learning in place of progressive child centred teaching techniques.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to the Centre for Policy Studies the decline in literacy and arithmatics amongst boys is the due to the shift in modern teaching techniques from traditional rote learning. It  also leads to a lack of discipline. it especially fails white and black boys from deprived backgrounds.
